I've been playing this game off and on since its release some years ago. The balance of the game is so broken that the game is almost completely un-playable if you're a survivor. The devs listen to whiny children and how they lose so much that they ignore the balance of the game entirely. If the devs actually actively played the game themselves (which they don't I've never seen one anywhere near the high ranks of the game) they could see the issues in their own game. The game is cool and can be entertaining but I wouldn't really recommend it unless you main killers exclusively and you enjoy every round being a seal clubbers clubbing club.
Better with 2 friends minimum

foda

Certain killers seem OP to me, especially the pig... survivors have to do a LOT of work to evade killers and be really good at dodging the killer's strikes, plus healing teammates can also prove to be more of a threat than help, failed skill checks give away your position. moreover doing generators when that stupid totem perk is active just makes it damn near impossible to escape. Or maybe I'm just really bad.

Oh yeah, there's no team voice chat or general chat in-game, only in the lobby, which kinda sucks.
You can fear more the survivors than the killer

buen juego, los desarrolladores se preocupan mas por hacer dinero con skins y dlcs que por el balance y arreglar los bugs, pero con todo esto buen juego 8/10
刚入的这款游戏，匹配机制对新手太不友好了，我技能都没满4个，其他玩家的技能全都是稀有的，关键是每把都是这样，这还让新玩家怎么玩？希望官方能改下匹配机制，别劝退太多新玩家了。

Dead By Daylight, for all intents and purposes, is extremely scuffed. It's glitchy, occasionally unbalanced, frequently toxic, and extremely infuriating to play. Despite all this, however, I find myself unable to part with it. Though it has it's fair share of issues, DBD is a highly rewarding game that you love to hate- from looping the killer around the map for four gens to getting a hard won 4K as your preferred killer, this game has it's own way of luring you back into it's clutches no matter how vehemently you swear at it.

Отличная игра , добавили лобби все круто , но РАЗРАБОТЧИКИ ПРОШУ ВАС НА КОЛЕНЯХ СДЕЛАЙТЕ ЧТО- НИБУДЬ С КЕМПЕРСТВОМ В ИГРЕ , ТАК КАК  ПРИ КЕМПЕРСТВЕ МАНЬЯК НЕ МОЖЕТ САМ ДЛЯ СЕБЯ ЗАРАБОТАТЬ ДОСТАТОЧНОЕ КОЛИЧЕСТВО ОЧКОВ И ДРУГИМ ЛЮДЯМ ПРОТИВ КОТОРЫХ ИГРАЕТ ТОЖЕ . Я НАЧАЛ ИГРАТЬ В ЭТУ ИГРУ ПОНЯЛ МЕХАНИКУ И СТАЛ ПРОДВИГАТЬСЯ К ПЕРВОМУ РАНГУ НО КОГДА Я ПОПАДАЮ В ИГРУ С КЕМПЕРОМ ТО Я НИЧЕГО НЕ МОГУ СДЕЛАТЬ ЕСЛИ ОН ПОЙМАЛ МЕНЯ ОН ПРОСТО СТОИТ НЕ НЕ ОТПУСКАЕТ И СООТВЕТСТВЕННО Я ТЕРЯЮ ОДИН РАНГ И ЭТО НЕ ЧЕСТНО .

Esse jogo é ótimo para jogar com os amigos e bolar uma estratégia o quanto tanto divertido. Cheio de personagens referentes a filmes de terror e tals. Com o tempo esse jogo vai ter mais e mais personagens deixando ainda mais divertido. Recomendo para aqueles que são amantes de terror, e também cooperativo. Ao menos... que o terror seja você.

Чувак, это коммьюнити отстой.
Я, бл*, ненавижу этих игроков.

Hru DBD jsem si oblíbil. Ač jí nehraji konstantně pořád, ale namádkově, tak má hra opravdový potenciál. Můžete hrát mnoha způsoby za obě škály postav. Baví vás killer, můžete hrát pouze je a naopak. Poté se nabízí i hraní pouze za užší škálu postav, která vás baví a můžete na nich udělat prestige. Osobně mě baví sekce survivors a tam je hodně možností jak danou sekci hrát. Rozhodně ve hře máte dostatek postav, takže se nemusíte bát o to, že by vám žádná nesedla. Rozhodně doporučuji :-)
This game is the reason why so many people are committing suicide

Super gierka na początku idzie się trochę posrać gdy się gra, ale z kumplami raźniej więc no :D 
Palety potrafią zdenerwować bo niekiedy nie lecą tak jak sie chce i 200IQ plan szybko zmienia się w -2IQ lecz idzie się pośmiać :3 
Szkoda ze ludzie zdarzają się w chuj toxic i potrafią campić przy kazdym graczu po czym napisać "easy" na chacie ale to juz patola, która w każdej grze w taki bądź inny sposób się objawia.
Ogólnie duzy plus bo to jedna z niewielu gierek horror, które znam a i tak jest wykonana bardzo starannie i da się poczuć ten klimat.
Tylko nie wiem czemu, ale ostatnio zdarzały mi się spadki FPS i nie wiem czy to wina tego ze od nowa zainstalowałem tę grę i mi się mapa wczytywała czy coś ale chyba to juz mi mija, więc jak ktoś nowy to się nie bójcie tych spadków są tym czasowe (chyba).
Ogólnie duzy plus + :3

我，是一位农场主人，可是不知道什么时候时候，我家的来了4个偷电贼。他们到处开我家的发电机投电，连我的老鼠夹都要拆，搞得我的庄家都被老鼠吃的差不多了.啊，那我没办法，他们私闯我的农场我当然要赶他们出去，可是我正要找他们讨论的时候，他们跟我玩起了躲猫猫，我找到了一位骚年我踹了他一脚，他趴着不起来似乎，想跟我玩碰瓷眼神似乎在乞求我留她在我的农场多看看风景 那好吧，我就把他挂了起来，站得高看得远嘛，叮叮叮，我们农场的大门开了,哦我知道了，他们玩够了要回家了，于是我打算去门口送他们,当我到门口的时候，他们在等着我，似乎很不舍得走，可是我一过去，他们就跑了。哎嘴上说不喜欢我，其实都舍不得我嘛.QAQ

Trash game !
2/10 for Optimization  - sloppy loadout n game 
1/10 for Bug fixes - which havent been fixed ever since the launch, cause devs think its funny
1/10 For Community - bunch of snowflakes who cry over every little change in mechanics
3/10 for Graphics  - they could do way better, esp when the game is made on engine 4
1/10 for Servers n ping  - peer to peer matches is a joke, not to mention imbalanced matchmaking in ranks, theres no point having a rank system tbh.
Absolute garbage Horror Survival game....I loved this game, but quit playing it bcoz the devs didnt really work to fix anything in it, just added more to the above infact n made it worse..

EDIT:
The game is much better now with dedicated servers, we get good ping and is much more playable, the new DLCs are interesting & so is the leaderboard system which was added in. They seem to hv fixed a lot of bugs too from the past. Id say the game is in way better shape now and much more playable. So id like to change my review & recommend it.

Got this game for free on PS4 last year and have been playing it ever since on a daily basis. Recently decided to take the plunge and get a new Desktop so i could play it. The difference between the PS4 Controller and the Mouse and Keyboard is a big gap, but i still enjoy the game despite knowing i can do better and obviously doing worse. 

The game is unique and fun and i would suggest it to everyone, but for as many good things i can say about Dead by Daylight it has just as many flaws. They are constantly working on the game fixing bugs and reintroducing some older one. It has a steep learning curve to learn and it can be a big grind though in the end it's all worth it if you fall in love with the game.

10/10 Amazing game

The killers are unique and fun to play. It is more relaxing to play survivor than killer. This game has a steep learning curve. Buying the DLCs is not a neccessity but it is essentially the fun part of the game. you could buy the DLCs you want and wait for the other character's perks to show up in shrine. Skins and battle pass are not pay 2 win just cosmetics, i.e, you can buy if you are interested in that.
There is toxicity on both sides(survivor and killers). The devs are really working to get the balance between survivors and killers. This game never stops suprising you...
GAME OF SHIT

The developers/support members are just the worst.
Instead of answering questions they insult you in a passive-aggressive way and tell you to stop playing their game if You don´t like them.
Game: 7/10
Developer: 1/10

On top of that the game is struggling to deliver a fair game experience for years, since people keep rage quitting and disconnecting with no visible consequences...

Furthermore you cannot find a match as killer in under 20 minutes. Wtf?

Edit:
My last interactions with support members have been rather positive.

The game is getting more balanced, minor balance issues are just always going to be expected in pretty much all games that are not 100% symmetric.

Finding a match as killer doesn´t take as long anymore.
DBD is getting really good.

Game: 9/10 (some glitches sometimes that shouldn´t be in the playable version)
Developer/Support: 9/10 (past experiences are unacceptable and cannot be undone but they show they have improved)

Jak bych začal... Princip hry je jednoduchý, spawnout se, opravit generátory a utéct (nebo skončit na háku). Hra dokáže zabavit na dlouhé hodiny hraní, ale lehce vás můžou odradit face camping kidi, co si svůj kill prostě nenechají utéct, afkeři, leaveři a mnoho dalšího, a to bez jediného postihnutí! (ať už ban nebo leaverbuster) Nejvíc vás na hře asi zklame, že pokud chcete hrát s kamarádem, tak jedině za survíky, nicméně, stále je tu ještě možnost vytvořit si vlastní hru, do které se můžou připojit pouze vaši přátelé ze steamu. Optimalizace také není nic moc.

+Nové postavy a mapy
+Kosmetické doplňky
+Eventy
+Srandy kopec (Ať už bugy nebo chasing :D)

-Bugy
-Dlouhé čekání na hru za killera
-Optimalizace
-Leaveři a afkeři bez postihnutí
-Face camping děti

很推荐这款游戏，对于我这种肝不动又想玩的有趣的人，PVP或PVE是我最好的选择，DBD是我很久就想体验的，他真实的场景，刺激紧张的追逐感，各种各样实用又奇葩的技能，还有恒久不变的bug，bug，bug！！！PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR！！我在游戏中穿过大门跑到篝火旁，再因时间耗尽而死，遇上军团再发现没法自摸，倒计时倒地........层出不穷的bug搞得我很无语。
 我并不认为DBD是一款恐怖多人游戏，看过付导和巨色，以及欢乐时刻后，黎明杀机确实很欢乐，，你不必全神贯注的投入，并没有那么吓人，相反，用战术深蹲嘲讽屠夫，人皇步蛇皮走位，U型墙藏红光套路，兔妈98K......千万不要被气的拔线，尽管你再抓不住人，尽管孝子屠夫树下守爹，除非遇到bug，否则千万别拔线，对对手的尊重将成为你欢乐组成的一部分，接着玩下去，你会越来越强，而不是生气的骂人而止步不前，拔线固然爽快，但无形中使游戏变成了你的累赘。
 最后，杀鸡天下第一，哦不，bug天下第一！！
